data.title: Simply Red singer Mick Hucknall talks about his sex life where he 'bedded three women a day'
data.meta_description: Mick Hucknall recently opened up about his sex life in the 80s and how he had a 'playboy' lifestyle filled with celebrities and A-listers, claiming it was a good time in
data.text:
Mick Hucknall recently opened up about his sex life in the 80s and how he had a 'playboy' lifestyle filled with celebrities and A-listers, claiming it was a good time in his life as a pop star.

Mick Hucknall has been the frontman of Simply Red and word around the campfire is that he has slept with more than a thousand women.

Mick Hucknall dated many women including Catherine Zeta-Jones

According to the Sun, he was involved with Catherine Zeta-Jones and Martine McCutcheon, models Helena Christensen and Melanie Sykes, aristocrat Lady Victoria Hervey and tennis star Steffi Graf.

The pop star opened up in an interview about being in the spotlight in his sexual prime "I was just touring the world and being ¬single, being a playboy, being a bachelor - I didn't really know what I was doing.

I was just having a good time ¬whenever. I like to have good times

Mick Hucknall

He elaborated on the experiences he had as he toured the world "I think in your life it's a good thing to have dimension, to have done lots of ¬different things, to have lots of different experiences.

Mick Hucknall also elaborated, "If you're only here once, then it's good to try and have all the experiences that life can offer you."

Mick Hucknall founded Simply Red in 1985 and has sold over 50 million albums

Mick Hucknall has had a great and successful career as a musician, however, in his peak he liked to party a lot, and to do so he mentioned that he would be on 15-hour benders mixed with cocaine and heroin.

Now that he is older he changed completely and looks for different passions including taking care of his 19000-acre vineyard in Mount Etna in Sicily.
